headline.main: 4 NATIONS FORM ANTI-GERMAN BLOC; Czecho - Slovakia, Yugoslavia, Poland and Greece Sign Pact at I.L.O. Conference

lead_paragraph: Delegates from Czecho-Slovakia, Yugoslavia, Poland and Greece attending the conference of the International Labor Organization announced to the conference yesterday their conclusion of an agreement for the establishment of a bloc of these four nations after the war.
abstract: Plans to join Czech, Polish, Yugoslav and Greek econ bloc after Hitler defeat

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
